name: Staring
description:
Have you ever gazed into the night sky, trying to figure out where the goddamn constellations are situated? And how could a bunch of straight lines being named after complex mythological figures? With "Staring" you can try to find some weird constellations in the night sky. Listen to the story of Boor and Zyght from the Man-Ure space tribe, as they remember the history of their ancients while trying to figure out where all the odd stars are placed in the sky.

Use your mouse or keyboard and navigate the sky, click the stars and try to make a constellation out of the hints. Feel the struggle and be utterly overpowered by the random figures in the sky.

Originally made for the Global Game Jam 2021 featuring the "Lost and found" theme. See the GGJ page here.
